body.p: supports the following absolute CSS Units:

ul.li: pt: points — the points used by CSS are equal to 1/72nd of 1in.
px: pixel units — 1px is equal to 0.75pt.

li.p: em: equal to the computed font-size property of the element on which it is used.

ul.li: rem: equal to the computed font-size property of the document root element.
